Recommendations: 1. More aggressive strategies and wider participation in the formulation, implementation, and evaluation of the VMGO may be explored to better articulate and demonstrate the congruence of the VMGO with the program's desired outcomes.
2. The vision and mission should be stated only at the university level; the goals at the college level; and the objectives, at the program level.

3. More visible, and wider circulation of the VMGO using state of the art media and
technologies could be explored and evaluated.
